title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: HS50001Course ContentsIntroduction: Information and its importance; Information goods: Pricing, versioning, Digital media and bandwidth, rights management; Decision-making under uncertainty: Expected utility, Risk aversion; Constrained optimization: Kuhn-Tucker conditions; Hidden actions (moral hazard): Incentives for managers, Insurance; Adverse selection: market for lemons, credit rationing, insurance markets, bid-ask spread; Screening: Insurance markets; Signaling: Market for lemons, education as a signal; Incentive mechanisms: Auctions: Effects on market prices and allocations.
